name: AllDICOMTerminologyDefinitions
title: All DICOM Controlled Terminology Definitions
publisher: FHIR Project on behalf of DICOM
description: All DICOM Code Definitions (Coding Scheme Designator "DCM" Coding Scheme Version 2024.2.20240331
